meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasing or agreeable to the senses
meanings.sent1: The sweetness of the flowers filled the room with a pleasant aroma.
meanings.sent2: I love the sweetness of fresh strawberries in the summer.
meanings.sent3: Her kindness and sweetness always brighten my day.
meanings.sent4: The sweetness of her smile was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The sweetness of the melody brought tears to my eyes.

meanings.definition: Kindness or affection in disposition or character
meanings.sent1: His sweetness towards animals showed his caring nature.
meanings.sent2: She treated everyone with such sweetness and respect.
meanings.sent3: The sweetness of her gesture made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His sweetness was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The sweetness of her words melted away any tension in the room.

meanings.definition: The taste experience when sugar dissolves in the mouth
meanings.sent1: The sweetness of the candy lingered on my tongue.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the sweetness of a ripe peach on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The sweetness of the dessert made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The sweetness of victory was evident in every bite of the celebratory cake.
meanings.sent5: The sweetness of the chocolate was pure bliss in every bite.
